before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"efika","text":"Prepare the steamer and the cook heater for boiling the samples into the antigen retrieval solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ard4o","text":"Fill the Glass bucket with the solutions on step 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kov0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ovjc","text":"This protocol is to withdraw the paraffin from formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue and organoids and to recover the protein structure of your sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9nga2","text":"Before star the experiment prepare the following solutions;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lndf","text":"TBS 1x","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o67h","text":"Sodium citrate buffer (10 mM Sodium citrate, 0.05% Tween 20, pH 6.0)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fffj9","text":"Tri-sodium citrate (dihydrate) 2.94 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ant1","text":"Distilled water 1 L","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o6r","text":"Mix to dissolve. Adjust pH to 6.0 with 1N HCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eifp5","text":"Add 0.5 mL Tween 20 and mix well. Store at room temperature for 3 months or at","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45sbj","text":"4°C for longer storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cngn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg77p","text":"Tris-EDTA buffer (10 mM Tris base, 1 mM EDTA solution, 0.05% Tween 20, pH 9.0)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fed1e","text":"Tris 1.21 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at495","text":"EDTA 0.37 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dndp3","text":"Distilled water 1 L","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cneh","text":"Mix to dissolve. Adjust pH to 9.0.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fia23","text":"Add 0.5 mL of Tween 20 and mix well. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mp6c","text":"Transfer the slide into the antigen retrieval solution in the steamer, turn on the cook heater and incubate 5 min after the valve is up, turn off the cook heater and wait till the valve get down again.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rdiu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s0a3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
